descript.abstract: This dataset contains generalized land use derived from parcel specific land use for Florida Department of Transportation (FDOT) District 6. This data was created by the Florida Geographic Data Library (FGDL). Appended to this FGDL district 6 data were the parcels from FGDL district 4 generalized land use data for Broward and Palm Beach counties. FGDL's 15 general land use classes were further colllapsed into 9 classes. Features were dissolved on the orginal FGDL general land use class to speed drawing time.
descript.purpose: The data serves as one of many base information layers for planning coastal resilience projects on coastalresilience.org.

idinfo.useconst: The Nature Conservancy makes no warranty as to the currency, completeness, accuracy or utility of any specific data. This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data.
